message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds immense value. While I can't disclose specifics at this stage, I assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me.  I'm confident this product has the potential to be even more valuable to you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.  This is a significant offer, and I'm sure you'll agree it represents excellent value. Please let me know your decision.
